name: Next death please!
description:
This is my very first game jam, and public game for that matter, so there will be a lot of flaws. if you don't think the game is good compared to the others, that's understandable.

Next death please is a very short, but funny and charming game, where you try to die.
i have nothing to say here really, I hope you will enjoy what the game has to offer.
